title: Im toxic.
body:
So just logged in to find my account permanently banned. Now my suspensions leading up to this ban were necessary. I was very toxic it came across in chat quite vulgarly; racism, homophobia. All the things that trigger riots team. However. I am shocked to see I have just been banned for screwing around with friends and being passive aggressive to the only one of the only two non-queued up persons in the game. Here are the logs

Game 1
Pre-Game
W0rstPlayerOfOCE: take vlad mid
W0rstPlayerOfOCE: i top
In-Game
W0rstPlayerOfOCE: Shit chroma %%%got
W0rstPlayerOfOCE: kys
W0rstPlayerOfOCE: All good guys I balanced out the toxicity
W0rstPlayerOfOCE: Flamed him a lil in team chat
W0rstPlayerOfOCE: vlad f 1855
W0rstPlayerOfOCE: :???
W0rstPlayerOfOCE: honoured
W0rstPlayerOfOCE: Top quality support
Post-Game
W0rstPlayerOfOCE: 10 notch
W0rstPlayerOfOCE: janna player
W0rstPlayerOfOCE: Top*

Now. I said 'Shit chroma %%%got, kys' after one of the enemies said something along the lines of cute chroma to our zed. To which I jokingly insulted him about it to balance the toxicity, which did come across as a joke as I clearly informed the enemy right after. I also called out vlads flash after he ate a wall with his flash also a joke. When it comes to the talk to my support she literally did the best play a janna could do that was sincere and I did honour her in the end. So it seems I was banned for joking with the word %%%got in it. I do not understand how riot have come this far pandering to such an immature audience of snow flakes. I also do not understand which of the two people in the game could have possibly found any of these comms purely toxic and deemed it worthy of a report. Look honestly i'd like an unban simply because this is a game and what is the point of a game without joking around in comms. Nothing is fun where everyone screams positivity into each others ears, especially in a normal where people are literally just learning and doing their own thing. And overall this is a little light, especially when you look retrospectively at my last suspensions is took 3 games both times of me screaming racism and homophobia to every single person on the team without a shred of sympathy before I was banned but this one took a joke. Unban.

replies.body:
"kys" is an insta-ban word, I'm afraid.

Oh, well. Either quit, level another account, or buy one.

Yes and no. 1 zero tol word will make your account hot and any more toxic behaviour will most likely get you banned. 2 is a instaban (this can be the same word twice). "kys" and "f%%%%t" are both 0 tol hence the ban.
Well he did live up to his username.
Shoulda learned your lesson the first few bans.
